snippet.title: Race Injection - PC - Injection Trailer
snippet.description:
RACE™ Injection enhances the smash hit formula of RACE 07 by combining the most requested content from five separate expansions -- Formula RaceRoom, WTCC 2010, STCC The Game 2, GT Power and the Retro expansion -- into one new retail pack.

Race Injection is now available on PC only.
For more information, please check out our website on http://www.namcobandaigames.eu/

Talk about this game, share tips & win goodies at http://www.namcobandaigames.eu/community
